metadata.feature_description: Provides advanced search capabilities for files and folders with sorting, filtering, and pagination

steps.action: Navigate to Assets panel and enter 'test' in search field
steps.expected: Search field accepts input and displays filtered results
steps.actual: Search field accepted 'test' input and breadcrumb showed 'SEARCH TEST'

steps.action: Trigger search by clicking sync/search button
steps.expected: Only files containing 'test' in filename should be displayed
steps.actual: 5 files matching 'test' displayed: test_image.jpg, test_image.png, test_image-thumb-154.png, test_image-thumb-156.jpg, test_upload_image.png. Search term highlighted in filenames.

steps.action: Click on Home dropdown to open folder tree navigation panel
steps.expected: Folder tree with search functionality should appear
steps.actual: Folder tree panel appeared with 'Folder Name' search box and hierarchical folder structure showing Site Root with 7 Results

steps.action: Enter 'Images' in folder name search and click Search
steps.expected: Only folders matching 'Images' should be displayed
steps.actual: Search filtered to show only 'Images' folder with '1 Results' displayed

steps.action: Click on Images folder to navigate
steps.actual: Successfully navigated into Images folder with breadcrumb showing 'Home > Images'

steps.action: Go to Home and search for 'cav' (partial match for 'cavalier')
steps.expected: Files containing 'cav' substring should be found
steps.actual: Search for 'cav' found 2 files: cavalier-tv.png, cavalier-tv-thumb-120.png. Breadcrumb showed 'SEARCH CAV' and 'cav' was highlighted in filenames.

steps.action: View assets with Alphabetical sort selected
steps.expected: Files and folders should be sorted alphabetically A-Z
steps.actual: Items sorted alphabetically: Badges, Groups, Images, Templates, TestFolder01, ToDelete, Users, cavalier-logo.png...

steps.expected: Items should be sorted by last modification date
steps.actual: Sort changed to 'Last Modified' and order changed: Templates, Badges, Users, Groups, Images, TestFolder01, cavalier-logo.png... (different from alphabetical)

steps.expected: Items should be sorted by upload/creation date
steps.actual: Sort changed to 'Date Uploaded' and order changed again: Images, Templates, Users, Badges, TestFolder01, Groups, cavalier-logo.png...

steps.action: Click on Images folder to navigate into it
steps.expected: Should enter Images folder and show its contents
steps.actual: Navigated into Images folder showing Publisher subfolder and image files

steps.action: Click on Publisher subfolder to go deeper in hierarchy
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to Home > Images > Publisher showing 5 files: test_image.png, test_image-thumb-154.png, test_image.jpg, test_image-thumb-156.jpg, cavalier-tv-thumb-120.png

steps.action: Click on Images breadcrumb to navigate back
steps.expected: Should return to Images folder via breadcrumb navigation
steps.actual: Successfully navigated back to Images folder via breadcrumb. Breadcrumb updated to 'Home > Images'

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Search with special characters - no results scenario

steps.action: Search for 'special' to find files with special characters in name
steps.expected: Should find files with 'special' in name or display no results message
steps.actual: Search returned 'Your Search Produced No Results' message. This indicates the file 'test file special chars.txt' may not be indexed in the search system.

steps.expected: Wildcard search should find all files starting with or containing 'test'
steps.actual: Wildcard search 'test*' successfully found 7 files: version_test.txt, test_image.jpg, test_image.png, test_image-thumb-154.png, test_image-thumb-156.jpg, test_upload_image.png, test_image2.png. 'test' highlighted in filenames.

steps.expected: View should reset to show all folder contents
steps.actual: Clearing search field reset the view to show all folders and files in Home directory. Breadcrumb returned to 'HOME' without search indicator.

observations: Search uses a throttled input (400ms delay) and requires minimum 3 characters to trigger automatic search
Search is performed via SearchController.Instance.SearchFolderContent which searches within the current folder recursively
The 'test file special chars.txt' file was visible in folder view but not found via search - this may indicate the file was recently added and not yet indexed by the search crawler
Wildcard character (*) is supported in search queries
Three sort options available: Alphabetical (A-Z), Last Modified, and Date Uploaded - all working correctly
Code review shows Sort Z-A is not a separate UI option - the Alphabetical sort provides A-Z ordering only
Sort by Size is not available in the UI dropdown - only three sort options exist: Last Modified, Date Uploaded, Alphabetical
Pagination is implemented via infinite scroll (loads more items when scrolling near bottom) rather than traditional pagination controls
